attributes.action: to take steps to rectify the West Lothian anomaly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: And to correct the situation where Scottish MSP's have the power to vote and legislate both on matters affecting Scotland and the rest of the UK,  whereas English and Welsh MP's who are not Scottish have no powers to vote on those matters devolved to the Scottish Parliament affecting Scotland.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
